LanguageData.NearParent.stages.0.label: near mom
LanguageData.NearParent.stages.0.description: My mother is near me. I feel safe.
LanguageData.NearParent.stages.1.label: near dad
LanguageData.NearParent.stages.1.description: My father is near me. I feel safe.
LanguageData.NearParent.stages.2.label: near mom and dad
LanguageData.NearParent.stages.2.description: My parents are with me. I feel safe and loved.
LanguageData.ScaredOfTheDark.stages.0.label: scared of the dark
LanguageData.ScaredOfTheDark.stages.0.description: It's too dark! I can see monsters creeping in the shadows!
LanguageData.GotToldOff.stages.0.label: got in trouble
LanguageData.GotToldOff.stages.0.description: I got in trouble for doing something I shouldn't have.
LanguageData.GotDisciplined.stages.0.label: got a beating
